pcr1i1.name: pcr1i1
pcr1i1.label: You show your child with words and gestures that you like him/her (Qu. 1)
pcr1i1.label_de: Sie zeigen Ihrem Kind mit Worten und Gesten, dass Sie es gerne haben (Frage 1)

pcr1i2.name: pcr1i2
pcr1i2.label: When your child makes new friends, you talk to him/her about them (Qu. 1)

pcr1i4.name: pcr1i4
pcr1i4.label: You lessen a punishment or end it early (Qu. 1)

pcr1i5.name: pcr1i5
pcr1i5.label: You cheer up your child when he/she is sad (Qu. 1)

pcr1i6.name: pcr1i6
pcr1i6.label: When your child goes out, you know exactly where he/she is (Qu. 1)

pcr1i7.name: pcr1i7
pcr1i7.label: You find it hard to set and keep consistent rules for your child (Qu. 1)

pcr1i8.name: pcr1i8
pcr1i8.label: You yell at your child because he/she did something wrong (Qu. 1)
pcr1i8.label_de: Sie schreien Ihr Kind an, wenn es etwas falsch gemacht hat (Frage 1)

pcr1i9.name: pcr1i9
pcr1i9.label: When your child goes out, you ask what he/she did and experienced (Qu. 1)
pcr1i9.label_de: Wenn Kind unterwegs war, fragen Sie nach, was es getan und erlebt hat (Frage 1)

pcr1i10.name: pcr1i10
pcr1i10.label: On some days you are stricter than on others (Qu. 1)
pcr1i10.label_de: Es gibt Tage, an denen Sie strenger sind als an anderen (Frage 1)

pcr1i11.name: pcr1i11
pcr1i11.label: You scold your child because you are angry at him/her (Qu. 1)

pcr1i12.name: pcr1i12
pcr1i12.label: When your child makes new friends, you get to know them soon thereafter (Qu. 1)
pcr1i12.label_de: Wenn Ihr Kind neue Freunde hat, lernen Sie sie auch bald kennen (Frage 1)

pcr1i13.name: pcr1i13
pcr1i13.label: You threaten child with a punishment but don't actually follow through (Qu. 1)
pcr1i13.label_de: Sie drohen Ihrem Kind eine Strafe an, strafen es dann aber doch nicht (Frage 1)

sdqpi1.name: sdqpi1
sdqpi1.label: SDQ: Considerate of other people's feelings (Qu. 2)

sdqpi3.name: sdqpi3
sdqpi3.label: SDQ: Often complains of headaches, stomach-aches or sickness (Qu. 2)

sdqpi4.name: sdqpi4
sdqpi4.label: SDQ: Shares readily with other children/youth (treats, toys etc.) (Qu. 2)

sdqpi7.name: sdqpi7
sdqpi7.label: SDQ: Generally well behaved, usually does what adults request (Qu. 2)
sdqpi7.label_de: SDQ: Im Allgemeinen folgsam; macht meist, was Erwachsene verlangen (Frage 2)

sdqpi8.name: sdqpi8
sdqpi8.label: SDQ: Many worries or often seems worried (Qu. 2)

sdqpi9.name: sdqpi9
sdqpi9.label: SDQ: Helpful if someone is hurt, upset or feeling ill (Qu. 2)

sdqpi12.name: sdqpi12
sdqpi12.label: SDQ: Often fights with other children/youth or bullies them (Qu. 2)
sdqpi12.label_de: SDQ: Streitet sich oft mit anderen Kindern oder schikaniert sie (Frage 2)

sdqpi13.name: sdqpi13
sdqpi13.label: SDQ: Often unhappy, depressed or tearful (Qu. 2)

sdqpi16.name: sdqpi16
sdqpi16.label: SDQ: Nervous in new situations, easily loses confidence (Qu. 2)

sdqpi20.name: sdqpi20
sdqpi20.label: SDQ: Often offers to help others (parents, teachers, other children) (Qu. 2)
sdqpi20.label_de: SDQ: Hilft anderen oft freiwillig (Eltern, Lehrern, anderen Kindern) (Frage 2)

sdqpi22.name: sdqpi22
sdqpi22.label: SDQ: Steals from home, school or elsewhere (Qu. 2)
sdqpi22.label_de: SDQ: Stiehlt zu Hause, in der Schule oder anderswo (Frage 2)

pcr2i1.name: pcr2i1
pcr2i1.label: When my child disobeys and breaks rules, he/she just wants to annoy me (Qu. 3)

pcr2i2.name: pcr2i2
pcr2i2.label: If there are problems with way I raise my child, it's my child's fault (Qu. 3)
pcr2i2.label_de: Wenn es Probleme in der Erziehung gibt, liegt das an meinem Kind (Frage 3)

pcr2i3.name: pcr2i3
pcr2i3.label: It seems to me when my child misbehaves, he/she does it with purpose (Qu. 3)

act1i5.name: act1i5
act1i5.label: Activities: Painting, building things or drawing (Qu. 4)

act1i99.name: act1i99
act1i99.label: Activities: Going to the theater, circus, museum, exhibits etc. (Qu. 4)

act1i10.name: act1i10
act1i10.label: Activities: Reading books together or telling stories (Qu. 4)

act1i11.name: act1i11
act1i11.label: Activities: Watching TV or videos together (Qu. 4)

pcr3i1.name: pcr3i1
pcr3i1.label: Your child tells you what he/she is thinking (Qu. 5)

pcr3i2.name: pcr3i2
pcr3i2.label: You show recognition for the things your child does (Qu. 5)
pcr3i2.label_de: Die Dinge, die Ihr Kind tut, werden von Ihnen anerkannt (Frage 5)

pcr3i3.name: pcr3i3
pcr3i3.label: Your child makes you do things his/her way (Qu. 5)
pcr3i3.label_de: Ihr Kind bringt Sie dazu, dass Sie sich nach ihm richten (Frage 5)

pcr3i4.name: pcr3i4
pcr3i4.label: You and your child are annoyed or angry with each other (Qu. 5)

pcr3i5.name: pcr3i5
pcr3i5.label: You show your child that you respect and like him/her (Qu. 5)
pcr3i5.label_de: Sie zeigen Ihrem Kind, dass Sie es gut finden (Frage 5)

pcr3i6.name: pcr3i6
pcr3i6.label: You and your child disagree and quarrel (Qu. 5)
pcr3i6.label_de: Sie und Ihr Kind sind unterschiedlicher Meinung und streiten sich (Frage 5)

pcr3i7.name: pcr3i7
pcr3i7.label: Your child gets his/her way when you can't agree on something (Qu. 5)

pcr3i8.name: pcr3i8
pcr3i8.label: Your child shares with you his/her feelings and thoughts (Qu. 5)

edu5i1.name: edu5i1
edu5i1.label: Extra lessons or classes in Math (Qu. 6)

edu5i2.name: edu5i2
edu5i2.label: Extra lessons or classes in German (Qu. 6)

edu5i3.name: edu5i3
edu5i3.label: Extra lessons or classes in Foreign languages (Qu. 6)

edu5i4.name: edu5i4
edu5i4.label: Extra lessons or classes in Another subject (Qu. 6)
edu5i4.label_de: Zusatz- oder Nachhilfestunden in anderem Fach (Frage 6)

edu11.name: edu11
edu11.label: Number of months child received extra lessons during past 12 months (Qu. 7)
edu11.label_de: Anzahl Monate Zusatz- oder Nachhilfestunden letzte 12 Monaten (Frage 7)

edu12.name: edu12
edu12.label: Average cost for extra lessons or classes per month (Qu. 8)
